Content.Text:
<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, <MYNAME>. Welcome.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I have just got a fresh batch of herbs
and was going to make some tea. Would
you like to join me?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Please come inside.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello, Ms. Olivia. What can I do for you
today?

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I don't need anything, in particular.
I just had some time so thought I'd see
if you wanted some tea with me.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I was just about to have tea with
<MYNAME>, actually. Would you like to join
us?

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you sure you're okay with me joining
the party? Sure I won't get in the way?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It will be fine.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You don't mind, do you <MYNAME>?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let us all go together, then.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'd expect no less, Sanjay. This is the
best herb tea I've had in quite some
time!

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you very much. It is an honor to
be praised by you, a tea specialist.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How is Master Amir, by the way?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
He passes each day most productively.
He did mention that maybe the three of
us should have dinner one day.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, that would be lovely. Please let him
know that I will graciously accept any
invitation.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you very much for today. It was a
great deal of fun. I'll see you again
soon, I hope.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you. Take care on your way home.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, is something the matter? You
seem quite subdued today.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I need you to talk to me before I can
understand anything. Please, tell me
what's on your mind.
I wanted to drink tea with just you
I couldn't get into the conversation
Forget it

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I see. My apologies, <MYNAME>. It was my
mistake.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
We are dating, so of course that was
your intention. My apologies for not
realizing it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I'll make sure nothing like this happens
again. Can you forgive me?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you so much, <MYNAME>. If I'm ever
doing something you don't like again,
please do let me know.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Allow me to walk you back to your house.
We can take the long route, if you like.
I'd love to talk to you for a while.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Thank you so much. Please, allow me to
hold your hand.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I see. My apologies, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Ms. Olivia is not only from my homeland
but also someone I have known for a long
time, so I just got carried away.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
We are dating, so of course I should
have tried harder to keep you
entertained.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I'll make sure nothing like this happens
again. Can you forgive me?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you so much, <MYNAME>. Allow me to
treat you to a meal, to make things up
to you. What do you want to eat?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's that? You want to make me some
food, too?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>It is certainly a while since anyone
has made food for me. I'd be delighted.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Shall we retire to the kitchen?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
You appear to be upset. Have I done
something that upset you?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Please, you can speak frankly with me.
I admit, I am finding a woman's heart
very difficult to understand.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I would like to know what is the matter?
Why are you upset? Is there no way you
can tell me?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I see. I think we need to cool off a
little. Let's call it a day, shall we.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Please, you can speak frankly with me.
I admit, I am finding a woman's heart
very difficult to understand.
